meanings.definition: The region of the atmosphere above the troposphere and below the mesosphere.
meanings.sent1: Birds fly freely in the stratospheres above us.
meanings.sent2: The plane soared through the stratospheres with ease.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous astronaut decided to picnic in the stratospheres.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reached stratospheres of success.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the stratospheres took my breath away.

meanings.definition: A very high or the highest point or degree.
meanings.sent1: The mountain peak reached stratospheres of height.
meanings.sent2: His ambition soared to stratospheres he never imagined.
meanings.sent3: The price of the rare gem was in the stratospheres.
meanings.sent4: Their excitement hit stratospheres when they won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice reached stratospheres of perfection.
